etymons.meaning: nachlässig, sorglos machen; ġfl (III): die Unachtsamkeit j-s benutzen

Preterit.turoyo: hedi mlele ʕebe ṭlawḥe w mġafele i=taḥolo w nafəq b-u=tarʕo-da w azzé
translations: He cautiously filled [his] pockets with lentils and taking advantage of aunt’s inattention passed the gate and left

Preterit.turoyo: Hoool dәmġaflila ḥašša hul dhawyo ... hátuste xud aḥunoni ... hawyo b̥ṭaʕno. Until they she made them inattentive pardon until she became… you are like my brothers… she became pregnant. NE_DF/

tokens.value: ... hawyo b̥ṭaʕno. Until they she made them inattentive

Preterit.text: Hoool dәmġaflila, ḥašša, hul dhawyo ... (hátuste xud aḥunoni) ... hawyo b̥ṭaʕno. Until they she made them inattentive, pardon, until she became… (you are like my brothers)… she became pregnant. NE_DF/16
